title: Hasbro Gaming Taboo Kids vs. Parents Family Board Game Ages 8 and Up
descriptions:
Introducing Hasbro Gaming Taboo Kids vs. Parents Family Board Game - the ultimate showdown for ages 8 and up! This fast-paced, family board game is perfect for game nights, challenging players to guess words without uttering forbidden ones. With a total of 260 cards and 1000 guess words, this game promises hours of fun and laughter.

The Kids vs. Parents edition brings a twist to the classic Taboo game, pitting family members against each other in a friendly competition for the highest points. The game includes two card decks - one for kids with familiar guess words and two forbidden words, and another for adults with varied and standard forbidden words. With 130 cards per deck, everyone will have a chance to put their word-guessing skills to the test.

The gameplay is fast-paced and timed, with a one-minute timer included to keep everyone on their toes. And don't forget about the squeaker! This fun element adds an extra layer of excitement, as players must be quick to buzz in and guess the word. Saying a forbidden word results in a point for the opposing team, so be strategic and choose your words wisely.

With Hasbro Gaming Taboo Kids vs. Parents Family Board Game, the winning condition is simple - most points win! So gather your family and friends and get ready for a night of fun and laughter with this exciting board game. Order yours today and see who will come out on top in this Kids vs. Parents showdown!
